addr: St Mary's Campus. Imperial College London. London W2 1PG GB
title: Researchers' Society Christmas Gala featuring Robert Winston
desc: Join us for an evening with Professor Robert Winston who will be speaking about his work, particularly public engagement and outreach in science. The event will start at 6pm with a drink reception and nibbles, and Professor Winston's talk will start at approximately 6.45pm and there will be an opportunity to ask questions after the talk. Evening drinks will follow.
